abstract: Former Lehman Brothers Asia executives, who headed the bank’s structured products division and its syndicate business, have launched their maiden hedge fund investing in distressed structured credit assets, Oracle Capital, Reuters reported.
snippet: Former Lehman Brothers Asia executives, who headed the bank’s structured products division and its syndicate business, have launched their maiden hedge fund investing in distressed structured credit assets, Oracle Capital, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Former Lehman Brothers Asia executives, who headed the bank’s structured products division and its syndicate business, have opened their maiden hedge fund investing in distressed structured credit assets, called Oracle Capital, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Ex-Lehman Executives Open a Hedge Fund

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas

abstract: SAP’s planned purchase of Sybase for $5.8 billion to move ahead of arch rival Oracle in the mobile data market has raised concerns the German software maker is paying too much, Reuters reported.
snippet: SAP’s planned purchase of Sybase for $5.8 billion to move ahead of arch rival Oracle in the mobile data market has raised concerns the German software maker is paying too much, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: SAP‘s planned purchase of Sybase for $5.8 billion to move ahead of archrival Oracle in the mobile data market has raised concerns the German software maker is paying too much, Reuters reported.

abstract: Jonathan Schwartz, who led Sun, had high, hard-to-believe praise for Larry Ellison, just days after the Oracle chief ripped Sun’s management in the press.
snippet: Jonathan Schwartz, who led Sun, had high, hard-to-believe praise for Larry Ellison, just days after the Oracle chief ripped Sun’s management in the press.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Schwartz, Sun’s former chief executive, thinks Larry Ellison, Oracle’s chief executive, is just swell. Or as Mr. Schwartz put it in an e-mail message to me, “Larry Ellison is a completely flawless, lovely man.”

headline.main: Sun’s Chief Still Sunny After Drubbing From Ellison
